document.full_text: the parents of the michigan toddler accidentally served alcohol at an applebee's restaurant last week have filed suit against the chain's parent company, saying its employees have made similar mistakes with other children.
document.title: parents of tipsy toddler sue applebee's over drink mixup
lines_and_colors: the parents of the michigan toddler accidentally served alcohol at an applebee's restaurant last week have filed suit against the chain's parent company, saying its employees have made similar mistakes with other children.
